name: Tequila and Campari With Tangerine
description: Tequila works surprisingly well with the bitter flavors of Campari in this easy pitcher cocktail. Añejo tequila complements the bright, sunny tangerine juice in the mix.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup fresh-squeezed tangerine juice from about 6 tangerines (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pitcher, combine Campari, tequila, and tangerine juice. Fill pitcher with ice, top with seltzer, and gently stir to combine. Serve with tangerine wedges in each glass.
